channel.title: [RSPSPK] Combat Trailer
channel.description:
Hi all, Decided to explore the RSPSPK Combat system; Here was the outcome. I don't usually edit video's and such, so i didn't do as bad as expected.
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ymMXlpNSYoQ[/youtube]
All feedback is appreciated. Thanks Again, Kyoto.

item.title: [RSPSPK] Combat Trailer
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

I think that RS is boring to watch. You need some other content that adds on to it. Even you talking about what’s going through your head when you make actions will add a lot.
Also, start lasts too long.
Also, careful of music usage.

Other than that, nice start. It’s rewarding making videos. I make a few terrible ones myself when I have time. Keep at it!

Read full topic
